name: Sneak Ahead
description:
Tired of stealth games giving you the option to crouch? No? Well I took it away anyways for your gaming pleasure

---Controls---

Arrow Keys : Move

R : Restart the level

Note: when crouching, your movement speed is halved (ie enemies take two steps)

-----------------

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2020, where the theme was "Out of Control." Huge thanks to Mark Brown of GMTK, itch.io and the Discord mods for organizing this event. It was a blast for my first game jam.

Also thanks to those who helped my on the GMTK Discord including @RexTGun, @0000 and @howie.

Good job to everyone who participated!
-petiole
